userStories.title: Login
userStories.description: As a user, I want to log in using my credentials so that I can access the system.

userStories.title: Password Reset
userStories.description: As a user, I want to reset my password so that I can regain access to my account if I forget it.

userStories.title: Dashboard Navigation
userStories.description: As a user, I want to view my dashboard after login to see account summaries and quick actions.

userStories.title: Report Generation
userStories.description: As an admin, I want to generate reports based on branch, account, and transaction data.

userStories.title: Customer Data Entry
userStories.description: As an operator, I want to enter customer account data so that new accounts can be created.

userStories.title: Logout
userStories.description: As a user, I want to log out securely when I finish using the application.
